trustfund:
TF035469-LAC REGION - GENDER CAPACITY BUILDING,TF033608-LAC REGION - GENDER & INST. INNOVATION,TF033425-EL SALVADOR - PRIVATIZATION, ENVIRONMENT,TF029363-PHRD - PUBLIC SECTOR
            MODERNIZATION PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Public Sector
            Modernization Technical Assistance Loan Project are to: (a)
            define new roles for the public sector; (b) strengthen
            operations for those entities that remain in the public
            sector; and (c) involve the private sector in the provision
            of public services. The project components include: (i)
            institutional restructuring and debureaucratization; (ii)
            human and financial resources management; (iii)
            privatization and private sector participation; and (iv)
            project coordination.
